concept.title: Modbus Read Holding Register (Function Call 03)

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Reference for Modbus Read Holding Register (function 03) with addresses and mapping for analog values such as voltages and frequencies.

othermeta.name: entities
othermeta.content: holding-register; modbus-pdu; scaled-value; register-address; analog-sensor; measurement-unit

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: read analog measured values via Modbus function 03 for telemetry and SCADA integration

conbody.p: The read holding register contains analog information, the measured value from the parameters.
The data is stored as 16-bit unsigned integer, with the hexadecimal format FFFF of 4 digits. This corresponds to a numeric value between 0-65535.
The factor for all values is 1. This information can be used to trigger alarms, actions or other events.
conbody.note: It is recommended that the delay poll is more than 10 seconds because the refresh rate of the register is about 10 seconds.
All holding registers between 40001-40047 are reserved even if not listed in the table.

entry.p: 3–phase: Phase L2 to phase L3. Only for three phase systems.
3–phase: Phase L3 to phase L1. Only for three phase systems.
3–phase: Phase L2 to phase L3. Only for three phase systems.
3–phase: Phase L3 to phase L1. Only for three phase systems.
Value reflects the actual operation mode of the system:

Only available if optional battery temperature sensor is installed at the battery. Shows Fahrenheit or Celsius value depending on firmware setting. If the temperature sensor is not installed this field will show a default value (around 226).
The phase output frequency of the system.
Percent of the output power capacity currently used.
Only available if optional Reality battery ABM is installed in the system.
The APP firmware version for the NMC.
The AOS firmware version for the NMC.
Factor The actual measured value is multiplied with a factor.
Phase L1 to Phase L2. 0 if not available.
Phase L2 to Phase L3. 0 if not available.
Phase L3 to Phase L1. 0 if not available.
Measured before the bypass transformer. 0 if not available.
Measured before the bypass transformer. 0 if not available.
Measured before the bypass transformer. 0 if not available.
The temperature sensor needs to be installed.
The temperature sensor needs to be installed.
The temperature sensor needs to be installed.
The temperature sensor needs to be installed.
The temperature sensor needs to be installed.
The temperature sensor needs to be installed.
The registers are lined up the following way: 16-13 12-9 8-5 4-1.
